16613.title: Clown and His Dogs
16613.plot: Short film of 300 individually painted images.

355532.title: Man on Parallel Bars
355532.plot: Lost film directed by William K.L. Dickson. Presented by Edison Manufacturing Company.

355757.title: Wrestling
355757.plot: A lost film, directed by William K.L. Dickson about two men wrestling.

88013.title: Poor Pierrot
88013.plot: One night, Arlequin comes to see his lover Colombine. But then Pierrot knocks at the door and Colombine and Arlequin hide. Pierrot starts singing but Arlequin scares him and the poor man goes away.

105153.title: Fencing
105153.plot: Early Edison short showing two men fencing.

105157.title: A Hand Shake
105157.plot: William K.L. Dickson and William Heise shake hands in this early experimental film.
